data.title: data.hrsa.gov Home Page
data.meta_description: The Health Resources and Services Administration (HRSA) is the primary Federal agency for improving access to health care services for people who are uninsured, isolated, or medically vulnerable
data.text:
Widgets

A widget is a tool that searches existing data sets and displays the results.

Health Center Program GeoCare Navigator

Map health centers and other federally-linked facilities to evaluate reach, penetration, and growth.

Health Equity Advancement/High-Need Mapping Tool

Map and combine community-level social determinants of health indices with HRSA Health Center and Grants data.

Map Tool

Build your own maps featuring a variety of HRSA data layers.

Maternal and Infant Health Mapping Tool

Map and combine county-level datasets on maternal health, infant health, and health resources.
